meanings.definition: (adjective) Having hair that is tightly curled or wavy.
meanings.sent1: Her frizzy hair bounced as she walked.
meanings.sent2: She used a special conditioner to tame her frizzy curls.
meanings.sent3: The frizzy hair looked like a wild forest on her head.
meanings.sent4: The frizzy waves danced in the wind like tiny springs.
meanings.sent5: The frizzy hair resembled a fluffy cloud on her head.

meanings.sent1: The humidity caused her hair to frizzy up.
meanings.sent2: After swimming, her hair would always frizzy.
meanings.sent3: His hair decided to frizzy itself just before the party.
meanings.sent4: The rain made her hair frizzy like a lion's mane.
meanings.sent5: The heat made the hair frizzy as if it had a life of its own.
